humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, there are 25 lymph nodes examined in total, and metastases are found in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (1/25). This corresponds to the N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic ductal carcinoma in one out of three sentinel lymph nodes examined (1/3), which classifies the patient as N1 according to the 8th edition of the AJCC staging system for breast cancer. The total number of lymph nodes examined, including sentinel and non-sentinel nodes, is 25, with one macrometastasis (1/25). The size of the largest metastatic deposit is 0.5 cm. There is no extranodal extension identified.
